Directions: In a large skillet, cook ham in butter until lightly browned. Add celery, onion and mushrooms; saute until tender. Combine the soup, milk, mustard and dill; add to the ham mixture. bring to a boil; reduce heat. Stir in sour cream; heat through. Serve over rice.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
